thread.title: Venkatesh to play a cop in next?
thread.title_full: Venkatesh to play a cop in next? - The Times of India

author: Pranita Jonnalagedda
title: Venkatesh to play a cop in next?
text:
Since the release of Gopala Gopala, Venkatesh has been in talks with several directors including the likes of Kranthi Madhav and Maruthi whose scripts were said to have "impressed" him. However, while those projects are "still under consideration", we have learnt that the actor could soon be playing a cop in a story penned by writer Vakkantham Vamsi.
While buzz in T-town suggests that Vamsi may direct the film as well, the story writer denied having any such plans saying, "My first directorial venture will be with NTR. As for the script, I did narrate a story to Venkatesh recently, but I can't say anything more than that at the moment."
Though the writer neither confirms nor denies the development, it looks like Venky is keen on doing the film. "It is an interesting story which sees the lead character, a cop, in a quirky avatar. The script is still raw and Vamsi has narrated only the outline and Venky seemed to have liked it. If Venky gives a nod, a suitable director will be roped in," shares the source.
Gopala Gopala director Kishore Kumar Pardasany (Dolly) is in the reckoning to helm the project. Stay updated on the go with Times of India News App. Click here to download it for your device.
